column4: just install unetbootin, open it, check the "disk image" box, browse for the iso you downloaded and hit ok and wait for it to finish
you are just trying to boot from your usb drive?

to do that open your bios's device menu and select the usb drive to boot from. most bios's have a key to open a simple boot menu, some you might have to go into the bios settings and change the boot loader that way. When you boot the pc the bios should tell you the correct key
when you boot when the bios pops up it usually gives you 1-2 keyboard shortcuts. usually one to enter bios settings and one to show boot menu
